Info.Title: Predator 2
Info.Writer: Jim Thomas (characters), John Thomas (characters), Jim Thomas, John Thomas

Info.Plot: Amidst a territorial gang war in 1997, a sophisticated alien hunter stalks the citizens of Los Angeles and the only man between him and his prey is veteran L.A.P.D. officer, Lieutenant Mike Harrigan.
